headline: Southwest Airlines is facing a $100 million lawsuit over paychecks
summary: Southwest Airlines (LUV) is facing a big-money class action lawsuit in New York regarding the way it pays its baggage handlers there. The human resources news site HR Dive reports that a group of workers are seeking $100 million in damages because their paychecks arrive bi-weekly instead of weekly in violation of New York state labor law.
